Text.Value: How did you end up here?
Very good. Now less talk, and find that temple!

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Suggestion that Valeria gives something / points towards something off-screen for the player.

Text.Value: There is no 'we' in this equation, my friend. I assure you, I am quite finished. Besides, it's plain to see that I'm well out of my depth here.
Citizen! Thank the gods you're here.
I didn't do it for you. I did it to gain access to Orin.
My wrinkles are starting to chafe. As an officer of the law, I demand you free me at once.
Aren't you going to stick around for the conclusion of the case?
Though I do wish you'd figured this all out before I - ah - put the blame for Father Lorgan's murder on that poor refugee. Well. At least it's over now.
I think this Tribunal was testing people for something else - we're not finished yet.
Thanks for freeing me so quickly. No idea what those Bhaalist berks had planned with me, but those chains were starting to chafe.
I suppose some thanks are in order - you did a good job putting a stop to those Bhaalist berks.
YOU! FREE ME AT ONCE!
You might not be finished - I am. It's plain to see that I'm well out of my depth here.
Don't go yet - we still don't know what Bhaal is planning!
I most wholeheartedly agree.
Took you bloody long enough - you've no idea how wrinkles like mine get caught in chains like that.
How can you be so sure that we're finished?
After our chat at Sharess' Caress, I thought it best to polish off the bottle I had started. I started coming over all woozy...
Oh. Well. I'd call you rude, but I have the misfortune of owing you my life.
But you... Well, you gave these reprobates a proper seeing to. You clearly have what I don't. Courage. Insight. Heroism.
I think it's best you get out of here.
Are you sure we're finished?
You gave these reprobates a proper seeing to. You clearly have what I don't. Courage. Insight. Heroism.
I assure you, I am quite finished. Besides, it's plain to see that I'm well out of my depth here.
The city needs you. I overheard these pigs talking - there's a Bhaal temple deep within the old Undercity that the cult is using.
The wrinkled orb is correct! Boo remembers the stench of the temple still.

EditorData.NodeContext: Referring to Valeira the hollyphant, still no idea what it is

Text.Value: My joints stiffened up quicker than a brothel-browser's loins. Paralysed. My vision went black. When I woke up - I was in chains.
I was enjoying a fabulous glass - well, several glasses - of some gnomish joymead at Sharess' Caress, when I came over all woozy.
Overall - a terrible ordeal. One deserving of a drink. I'd bid you good day, but it's been royally shite all round.
Leave.
Mind who you call history, hollyphant.

EditorData.NodeContext: Deadpan - flat warning to Valeira, who unwittingly referred to her deeds as if they happened centuries ago.

Text.Value: A century ago it was destroyed by a group of heroic sorts. Let's hope history repeats itself, eh?
We're not finished yet - the ritual was just the beginning of Bhaal's resurgence.
If I know Bhaal, this isn't over.
It's about to get worse. We need to put a stop to the Bhaalist resurgence.

Synopsis: Interactive dialogue with Valeria after taking down the Murder Tribunal and saving her from the Baptism of Blood. She will head off after this and disappear out of sight.
